poster: D A R K IVI A N
title: Is there a way to get a atleast a partial refund if you know you gonna get permabanned soon?
body: Just asking. I know i'm going to get permabanned really soon and i wanted to know if you can get some kind of refund for RPs. thx

replies.body:
it's stated on riot EULA that the account you're using , is property of riot games.
Spending moneys is just your choiche, and there's no refund for this. (or at least a limited possibility)

knowing you'll get permabanned soon, means you even know your behaviouf is not one of the best. in this case, correct yourself, or run on a smurf account and get that banned instead.
Beh, u can ask riot to not permaban you, if was not your fault. Is really really really improbable riot will not permaben u but... what do you lose if u try?
Banner for flame? Why dont u buy some more skins? Maybe riot will have mercy if they see that u are giving them more money... Trust me try it out
